website_summaries.verdict: Excellent cooling headband for workouts or working. Headband stays in place and keeps sweat in its place.
pros: Adjustable strap that keeps band firmly in place and custom-sized to fit your head
Really keeps sweat out of your eyes
Due to fast-drying technology, doesn't feel wet on your skin
For greater cooling effect, wet with cold water, then place on head
cons: Some reviewers don’t like the logo on the headband, but it can be turned inside out to conceal

customer_reviews.title: Good headband for hard workouts
customer_reviews.text: This band fits very well and I have a tiny pin-head which rejects headbands as a general rule. The fact that it is adjustable is great and it held every bit of sweat that came its way. I did a trial run with it during a crossfit class in 100 degree weather and it performed as it should. The only thing I don't like is the logo smack in the middle of my forehead, but the orange-ish/red-ish colored one seems to hide the logo pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: So soft, adjustable and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. Usually headbands slip off on me unless I wear them over my ears, which I dislike doing. This one is perfect. One less star for limited styles. Not the prettiest and I could do without the logo.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. Does a fantastic job keep sweat out ...
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I'll admit it, I'm out of shape and 47 years old. So, yeah I sweat a lot from my forehead when the sun's out. That's how us out of shape guys do it. So, after growing tired of having sweat in my eyes, I decided to buy this and get my sweatband mojo on. LOVE IT. Does a fantastic job keep sweat out of your eyes. Would buy again and would recommend to any other sweaty people out there. You know who you are!
customer_reviews.author: StLouisMO

customer_reviews.title: ... thought I would give this a try because I like top wear headbands when I am doing sports
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this a try because I like top wear headbands when I am doing sports. I have something similar I wear that I really like. What I do is wet them with cold water, snap the material and put it on. It has a nice cooling effect. I don't like this one as well as my other brand as the material appears to be not as thick, therefore drying out faster. But I'm sure I will get a lot of good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable, sometimes I forget I'm wearing it. Definitely keeps sweat out of my eyes, however, doesn't really maintain a cooling effect after the cold water wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Fattony

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted to wear under my helmet on hot days!
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, and works well when I use it inside my riding helmet top keep the sweat from my face on hot days. I haven't yet tried the cooling feature, but believe it will work as I have several Mission cooling items, and they all work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Open to great experiences

customer_reviews.title: Poor absorption
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t stay cool and hardly absorbed sweat. I followed instructions to snap and it would activate, nothing much occurred. I’m better off with the old fashioned terry cloth headbands I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: basan nembirkow

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I didnt even get to wear this because the whole side was torn 😢.... I have another one in this brand that I love so I bought a second one..... So since I spent money and couldn’t use.... one star... sorry
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't absorb sweat like advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a similar sweatband from Arctic Cool, which worked perfectly. Played pickleball 2 hrs in Fl sun and never had to wipe my face. I then saw this product which had a wider band and I thought it would work even better. Wore it today and was very disappointed, it did not capture nearly as much sweat as the other and I had to stop numerous times to wipe the sweat from my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: topdown

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this under a ball cap when hiking and under my helmet when horseback riding. It is lightweight and comfortable. I barely know it’s there. However, it still does it’s job of absorbing the sweat!
customer_reviews.author: mkane

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you remove.
customer_reviews.text: It works great just be careful when you remove. I am usually too tired to open the clasp and just pull it off my head. It can grab your hair so do as I say and not as I do, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Kim NC

customer_reviews.title: Try others by this brand, but I don't recommend this exact headband.
customer_reviews.text: Don't love this one. I have another headband by this company that I like much more. This one looks nice, but it doesn't keep me cool and doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I want more !
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this band--it's lite weight &stays in place. I usually wear a hat along with band & no more sweat dripping on my glasses !
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: These things actually work!
customer_reviews.text: Hard working lady here that turns into a ninja in the dojo twice a week. Always sweating like crazy and these things really work and help keep me cooler!
customer_reviews.author: g. mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my head cool.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to wear around the house when I do housework. My home gets very hot. It really helped. I wear under my baseball hat when I walk my dog. Keeps my head cool.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Goodman

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: 1 star on warmth cause its not supposed to keep u warm. Works great to keep me COOL though!
customer_reviews.author: Jimi P.

customer_reviews.title: A Must!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well! I used it repeatedly at Fisney in the humid, hot FL weather. It was so easy to keep wetting it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: fits
customer_reviews.text: I really like the headband. It fits my head really well and keeps the sweat out of my eyes. I didn't notice any cooling but my forehead wasn't hot.
customer_reviews.author: worm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, fits well and I get it wet and then put it on.
customer_reviews.author: QHeatherB

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: It's small. Nothing at all like in the description. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: james owl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: keeps me cool while at work in a hot kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless for shaved heads
customer_reviews.text: Completely worthless for me. I have a shaved head and just wanted something to keep the sweat out of my eyes when mowing the lawn. It filled with sweat in 10 minutes and was like using no headband at all. Maybe it works for people with hair.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and much more fashionable then the headsock or bandana ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my GF as she was traveling to the desert for hiking. Worked great and much more fashionable then the headsock or bandana version.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Flex

customer_reviews.title: Fashionably Cool!
customer_reviews.text: We have been having some really unseasonably warm temps on the East Coast...we have had windows open and we even turned on the air conditioner one really warm February night. This is a great little adjustable headband...perfect for working outside...perfect for working out inside. It is a great cooling headband for me. Keeps hair off of my face while I work in the gardens or on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: That’s my Patty!

customer_reviews.title: Soccer player's favorite headband
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who plays soccer and has very thick hair that is hard to keep out of her face during practice and games. She has numerous headbands, but this is now her favorite and she keeps it in her soccer bag. It is soft, lightweight, and it keeps sweat out of her eyes. The best feature is that it is adjustable, so it fits her head perfectly, and it's thin on the underside so it doesn't feel bulky. There is a logo right at the front center of the band, which I think is a little annoying, but she (who is 11) doesn't mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Great headband
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with headbands always falling off and I thought this would be the same until I learned there is a way to tighten it. Yea!!! It really worked and I was able to wear it for a long period of time. I will be wearing these more. I received this item for my honest opinion and did not receive compensation.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fits well
customer_reviews.text: It's a little wide, but that's personal preference. It's very soft and with the elastic in the back, it fits well and feels comfortable. I am a runner so I prefer something a little bit smaller to not overheat my head but it does definitely keep the sweat out of my eyes. The quality is good and the rest is just personal preference. I'd say that it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: so we gave it a good test. Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Much more effective than the old stretch terry headband we had before. Keeps that sweat out of the eyes without adding a lot of heat on its own. Definitely washable: I accidentally dropped it on my peanut butter toast, so we gave it a good test. Comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This headband was cute and held down my edges during vigorous kickbox and dance workout. It is adjustable, but because of the way it's made it does not protect your edges in the back from becoming curly, thus I deducted one star.
customer_reviews.author: K.H. :)

customer_reviews.title: I like that it doesn't give me a headache like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and adjustable! I like that it doesn't give me a headache like a lot of headbands do after wearing for a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Boyzoo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and worked the first few times I used it. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Frazier

product_meta.title: Mission VaporActive Cooling Lockdown Headband
product_meta.description: Cooler heads prevail in our Lockdown Cooling Headband. The lightweight, soft-touch cooling headband was designed to keep you cool while looking great. Wear it at the gym, on game day or anytime you're outside and need to beat the heat. Built for good looks and better performance, the Lockdown Cooling Headband is a must-have for athletes, fitness junkies, outdoor enthusiasts and anyone who wants to keep cool no matter what. Next-level VaporActive, powered by patented 37.5 technology, attracts moisture at the vapor level and rapidly removes sweat, keeping you cool, dry and comfortable. Permanently embedded at the fiber level, the fast-drying technology never degrades or washes out. Fabric contains active particles that attract and trap odor-causing molecules, later releasing them in the wash.
feature_bullets: Body: 46% Cocona 37.5 Polyester/46% Polyester/8% Spandex; Lining: 47% Cocona 37.5 Polyester/53% Polyester
Patented 37.5 technology attracts and rapidly evaporate sweat to keep you cool, dry and comfortable - and keep stinging sweat out of your eyes.
Adjustable strap with slide-on hook for lockdown fit that keeps hair in place, even during rigorous training or competition
Chemical-free and machine washable; permanent technology is incorporated at the fiber level and will never degrade or wash out
VaporActive technology prevents buildup of odor-causing bacteria and microbes
